hero.tagline: Your personal AI companion for emotional wellness and self-reflection using VOICE journaling

features.title: How SOULo Works
features.subtitle: Our innovative approach combines voice journaling with AI technology to provide you with meaningful insights about yourself.

feature1.title: Voice Journaling
feature1.description: Record your thoughts with voice and let SOULo transcribe and analyze them automatically.

feature2.title: AI Analysis
feature2.description: Gain insights into your patterns and emotions through advanced AI analysis.

feature3.title: Emotional Tracking
feature3.description: Visualize your emotional journey over time with interactive charts.

feature4.title: AI Assistant
feature4.description: Chat with your journal and get personalized insights from your past entries.

footer.contact: You can contact us anytime at

mainTagline: Keep a journal and capture your day without writing down a single word!

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Articles, guides and stories on journaling, wellness and AI
blog.author: Author
blog.subscribeDesc: Stay updated with our latest articles and insights

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At SOULo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and related services.
privacy.personalDataDesc: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when creating an account or using our services, including:
privacy.voiceRecordingsDesc: SOULo's primary function is voice journaling, which involves:
privacy.voiceRecordings3: Emotion and theme analysis derived from your entries
privacy.usageDataDesc: We automatically collect certain information about how you use our app, including:
privacy.usageData2: App features you use and how you interact with them
privacy.usageData3: Time and date of your use
privacy.dataUseDesc: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.dataUse1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
privacy.dataUse3: Send administrative information, such as updates or security alerts
privacy.dataUse4: Respond to your comments and questions
privacy.dataUse5: Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience
privacy.dataUse6: Generate anonymized, aggregated data for research purposes
privacy.journalPrivacyDesc: Your voice recordings and transcribed journal entries are stored securely on your device. When you use AI analysis features:
privacy.journalPrivacy1: Data is processed with end-to-end encryption
privacy.journalPrivacy2: We do not permanently store the content of your journal entries on our servers
privacy.journalPrivacy3: AI processing results are returned to your device and stored locally
privacy.journalPrivacy4: Journal entries are never shared with third parties
privacy.securityDesc: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. These measures include:
privacy.security1: End-to-end encryption for data in transit
privacy.security2: Secure local storage with encryption on your device
privacy.security3: Regular security assessments of our systems
privacy.security4: Employee training on privacy and security practices
privacy.securityDisclaimer: While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal data, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
privacy.dataRetentionDesc: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
privacy.rightsDesc: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.rights1: Access and receive a copy of your data
privacy.rights2: Rectify or update your personal information
privacy.rights3: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.rights4: Restrict or object to our processing of your data
privacy.rights6: Withdraw consent at any time (where processing is based on consent)
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy.
privacy.childrenDesc: Our service is not directed to anyone under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and you believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

voiceRecorder.speakAnyLanguage: Speak in any language, I'll understand you!
voiceRecorder.notEnoughAudio: Not enough audio to process. Please record for at least 2 seconds.
